alert.note: Alert for Jefferson (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 18 at 12:32AM EDT by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT CENTRAL JEFFERSON COUNTY THROUGH 115 AM EDT... At 1230 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a near stationary line of strong thunderstorms extending from 6 miles southwest of Redwood to near Henderson Harbor. Movement of the individual cells was to the northeast 20 mph but the line was only drifting east at about 5 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and frequent downpours. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Watertown, Fort Drum, Dexter, Glen Park, Henderson Harbor, Adams Center, Sackets Harbor, Henderson, Smithville, Brownville, Theresa, Evans Mills, La Fargeville, Perch Lake, and Perch River. This includes Interstate 81 between exits 42 and 49. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. The training thunderstorms have already generated over an inch of rain for some areas in just 45 minutes. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
